## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.type property

The accordion type (Single/Multiple). This defines whether the accordion allows single or multiple items to be open at once.


 {<!-- -->string<!-- -->} The accordion type, either 'Single' or 'Multiple'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly type: import("@angular/core").ModelSignal<import("../../configs/accordion-config").NgxPrimerAccordionType | "Single" | "Multiple">;
```
